head: SAMRIDHI – Smart Animal Management & Rural Innovation for Dairy Health Initiative
longtext: SAMRIDHI is a field-ready digital ecosystem that empowers farmers and veterinarians to accurately identify cattle and buffaloes, monitor health status, optimize breeding, and improve genetic outcomes — even in low-connectivity rural environments.
f1: Camera-based biometric identification eliminates manual tagging errors
f2: AI-driven health diagnostics for early disease detection and intervention
f3: Comprehensive breeding management to enhance genetic quality and productivity
f4: Offline-first design ensures functionality in low-connectivity rural areas
uploadphoto: Upload a photo of your cattle
limit: File size limit: 10MB. For jpg, png, jpeg formats
caption: Real-world dairy operations • Rural India

footer.desc: A smart cattle management system with AI-powered recommendations to help you manage your dairy farm efficiently.
